name: It's a crystal planet after all!
name_original: It's a crystal planet after all!
description:
In 'It's a crystal planet after all', you are a small robot with a drill. You've stranded on a weird, small planet somewhere far, far away in the universe. There is no other option, except for drilling your way through and collecting crystals from the wall to stay alive!

However, several monsters live inside the planet, willing to take your crystals, and the walls seem to be re-growing from absolute nothingness!

Do you have what it takes to survive on the planet?

This game is inspired by the classical Lego Rock Raiders and poses players with classic threats, such as appearing rock monsters, drilling walls and gathering crystals.

Try to survive as long as possible in order to show off to all of your friends that you've survived for a very long amount of time and thus are clearly the best.
